text: Jung Bi-Won (born 15 January 1960) is a retired South Korean boxer who was the IBF Flyweight champion from 27 April 1986 to 2 August 1986. Jung made his professional debut against Sun-Tae Lee on 27 February 1982 at the Munhwa Gymnasium in Seoul. == References == Category:Living people Category:1960 births Category:South Korean boxers Category:International Boxing Federation champions Category:Flyweight boxers
title: Jung Bi-won
